Lack enough support: The claim lacks direct quotes or evidence from Jerry Jones stating that players will be kicked off the team if they do not stand for the anthem.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Jerry Jones made the statement to players, but there is no direct evidence or confirmation of this.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that Jerry Jones may have expressed support for standing during the anthem without explicitly stating that players would be kicked off the team.
Understate: The claim may understate the complexity of the issue by oversimplifying it to a binary choice of standing or being kicked off the team.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there is no direct quote or evidence of Jerry Jones making the statement to players.
Falters at times: The claim falters by relying on a tweet from Texas Gov. Greg Abbott and a conservative website's article, which do not provide direct evidence of the statement.
Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the significance of the statement by presenting it as an ultimatum from Jerry Jones when there is no direct evidence of this.
